summary: WHEN THE CAR STARTS DRIVING FIRST THING IN THE MORNING ON COLD DAYS THERE THERE A BRIEF BUZZING SOUND COMING FROM THE FRONT RIGHT SIDE OF THE CAR. THIS IS MORE PRONOUNCED AND REGULAR WHEN TRACTION CONTROL COMES ON. IT DIDN'T HAPPEN FOR THE FIRST 2 AND HALF YEARS BIT NOW  IS IS QUITE COMMON.
